text: Sam'manako (haramako) mahina sam'manita mahinako sato cha ra sam'manaka kuraharu eka arkako badala saraha hun tasartha yadi kasaile timimathi atikramana garcha bhane juna kisimako atikramana tyasale gardacha, tyastai timile tyasamathi gara ra allahasita dara, yadarakha ki allaha dara manneharuko sathama cha
